channel.title: Custom monster models

item.title: Custom monster models
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Hello everyone, while merching on runescape I have desided to learn a little more about bluurrs clients so I can make one thats loads atleast 10 times faster and is more stable because lets face it, deltas will never die. So im at a little snag point here and I know this will be an easy answer for most of you older members. What does each Array number mean? I would really love if you guys could tell me so I can work at being a better member of the community and release a few big fixes to the bluurrs client. Thanks - Andrew

if(i == 1115)
        {
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
            class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
            class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
            class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
            class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2];
            int k1 = 1;
            class5.anIntArray76 = new int[k1];
            class5.anIntArray70 = new int[k1];
            class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61;
            class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926;
            class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10490;
            class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10491;
            class5.anInt67 = 7058;
            class5.anInt77 = 7059;
            class5.aString65 = "General Graardor";
            class5.anInt61 = 624;
            class5.aByte68 = 4;
            class5.anInt91 = 110;
            class5.anInt86 = 110;
            class5.aByteArray89 = "A huge war chief.".getBytes();
        }
